text: @Yamiche @sweeper53 We can all agree that the focus is no longer on the coronavirus. Dr. Fauci has all but been sidelined & now updates the country through his appearances on CNN etc. By so doing, I believe that Dr. Fauci has spared us the anguish of listening to Trump's bull💩.
